scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:synth && npm run build:player && npm run build:editor
scripts.build:synth: npm run build:synth:tsc && npm run build:synth:rollup && npm run build:synth:terser && npm run build:synth:cp
scripts.build:synth:rollup: npx rollup build/synth/index.js --file bundle/beepbox_synth.js --format iife --output.name beepbox --context exports --sourcemap --plugin rollup-plugin-sourcemaps --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.build:player: npm run build:player:tsc && npm run build:player:rollup && npm run build:player:terser && npm run build:player:cp
scripts.build:player:rollup: npx rollup build/player/index.js --file bundle/player/beepbox_player.js --format iife --output.name beepbox --context exports --sourcemap --plugin rollup-plugin-sourcemaps --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.build:editor: npm run build:editor:tsc && npm run build:editor:rollup && npm run build:editor:terser && npm run build:editor:cp && npm run build:editor:sed
scripts.build:editor:rollup: npx rollup build/editor/index.js --file bundle/beepbox_editor.js --format iife --output.name beepbox --context exports --sourcemap --plugin rollup-plugin-sourcemaps --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.clean: npx rimraf -v build bundle dist/esm dist/global dist/synth
scripts.live-editor: npx concurrently "npm run live-editor:tsc" "npm run live-editor:rollup" "npm run live-editor:server"
scripts.live-editor:rollup: npx rollup build/editor/index.js --file website/beepbox_editor.js --format iife --output.name beepbox --context exports --sourcemap --plugin rollup-plugin-sourcemaps --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve --watch.buildDelay 200 -w
